column1: {'summary_text': "He can't log in to his SAPconcur account because he forgot his password. The SPAM order is empty and the e-mail address is not working properly. He needs to reset his password to access the account. He also needs to send e-mails."}

{'summary_text': 'This is an external e-mail. Caution is needed when clicking links or opening attachments. In case of emergency, contact your IT department.   "Cargo" is a Polish POTENZIALE EMAIL CLIENTE. "Nostri Partner" is an Italian E-mail client. '}

{'summary_text': "Sebastian can't log in to his SAPCONCUR because he forgot his password. The SPAM order is empty and there is no e-mail address to reset it.   This is an EXTERNAL EMAIL, so take care when clicking links or opening attachments. "}
